books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: An escaped child molester pursues Lt. Eve Dallas; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: NEW YORK TO DALLAS

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow, which revealed will change many lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: When a young man finds a bag of diamonds, he gets the attention of the Ghost, a major assassin, and a rival assassin who wants the Ghost gone forever.
books.name: KILL ME IF YOU CAN

books.author: by Erin Morgenstern
books.description: Two young rivals at a magical circus become collaborators as they fall in love.
books.name: THE NIGHT CIRCUS

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch investigates the scandalous death of a narcotics officer.
books.name: THE BLACK ICE

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece's murder.
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by CJ Lyons
books.description: A woman finds no closure after a man is executed for the murder of her husband and son.
books.name: BLIND FAITH

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Bruce Peyton’s pregnant wife has left him, and he’s not the only one in town with problems; Book 11 in the Cedar Cove series.
books.name: 1105 YAKIMA STREET

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: Two troubled young rodeo performers are unable to avoid falling in love, no matter what consequences their actions might bring.
books.name: A THOUSAND TOMORROWS

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Unsuspecting drivers wind up dead after pulling into a boarded-up rest stop on a Maine highway.
books.name: MILE 81

books.author: by Michael Brandman
books.description: Jesse Stone, the chief of police in Paradise, Mass., confronts an outbreak of murders; a continuation of the series by Parker, who died in 2010.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER’S KILLING THE BLUES

books.author: by Tatiana de Rosnay
books.description: A contemporary American journalist investigates what happened to a little girl during the roundup of Jews in Paris in 1942.
books.name: SARAH’S KEY

books.author: by Jackie Collins
books.description: Lucky Santangelo fends off a Middle Eastern prince who wants to buy her Las Vegas hotel complex.
books.name: GODDESS OF VENGEANCE

books.author: by Barbara Freethy
books.description: Together with a man who says he’s her baby’s father, a woman with amnesia goes in search of the child and tries to discover who wants her dead, and why.
books.name: SILENT RUN
